effect.gold_silver: Pokémon on the user’s side of the field are immune to stat-lowering effects for five turns. guard swap, heart swap, and power swap may still be used. defog used by an opponent will end this effect.
effect.crystal: Pokémon on the user’s side of the field are immune to stat-lowering effects for five turns. guard swap, heart swap, and power swap may still be used. defog used by an opponent will end this effect.

short_effect.gold_silver: Protects the user’s stats from being changed by enemy moves.
short_effect.crystal: Protects the user’s stats from being changed by enemy moves.
